front.title: RADIUS Attributes for Multilink PPP Banwidth Allocation Control

abstract.t: This document describes a set of vendor-specific RADIUS attributesdesigned to support the dynamic control of bandwidth allocation in mul-tilink PPP [1]. Attributes are defined that specify whether use of thePPP Bandwidth Allocation Protocol [2] is allowed or required on incomingcalls, the level of line capacity (expressed as a percentage) belowwhich utilization must fall before a link is eligible to be dropped, andthe length of time (in seconds) that a link must be underutilized beforeit is dropped.
